settings.title: How does it work?
settings.text:
Shopping with Catwalk Wholesale is very easy.

In order to purchase from Catwalk Wholesale you will need to register for an account. The registration form is simple and intuitive and is completed on line. Please click here or alternatively click the "Log In" link which is located in the top right hand area of all pages and complete the registration form.

settings.title: Can I Use your images ?
settings.text:
All the photos on the Catwalk Wholesale website are protected under copyright law.

Only customers of Catwalk Wholesale can use the photos after the order has been placed.

We care about your business to ensure you get the maximum exposure of the products you buy from Catwalk Wholesale.

“Photos sell.” and here at Catwalk Wholesale, we are proud to offer the absolute best, highest quality photographs compared to all other UK clothing wholesalers.

As a Catwalk Wholesale customer, you will be able to download the images without the watermark once you place and pay for your order.

The images without watermark will be available in your order section in your Account

settings.title: Do you accept returns?
settings.text: Catwalk Wholesale offers a 'No Quibble 7 Day Guarantee' on all purchases.

settings.title: I am unable to view pricing.
settings.text:
Please ensure you are logged in. Only registered users of Catwalk Wholesale can view pricing on line.

Please log in or register for an account.

settings.title: I am unable to add items to cart.
settings.text:
Please ensure you are logged in. Only registered users of Catwalk Wholesale can add items to cart.

Please log in or register for an account.

settings.title: What is the minimum order?
settings.text: The minimum order is £100 excluding delivery charge and VAT.

settings.title: Do you ship outside of UK?
What is shipping cost?
settings.text:
Postage for every order is calculated by our system depending on destination and number of items in cart

For UK customers we offer flat shipping charge of £9.90 and postage for orders over £250 is free.

Estimate Shipping and Tax section from you cart can also quote the estimate.

settings.title: What is dispatch time?
settings.text: We aim to dispatch all orders same day upon receiving cleared payment before 13:00 GMT. Orders paid after this time will be dispatched next day.

settings.title: What is delivery time?
settings.text:
UK: 99.99% of our packages arrive the next working day

US: 99.99% of our packages arrive the next working day

Worldwide: Delivery within 2 – 4 working days
